## `ExcludeProperNouns` {#batch-excludepropernouns}

Specifies whether to exclude proper nouns.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
ExcludeProperNouns(boolean exclude)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
`boolean` exclude | `true` to exclude proper nouns.
